rooms.description: A welcoming area with a wide entrance door for wheelchair access and ample space for maneuverability.
An eco-friendly living room incorporating natural lighting through large windows, sustainable materials, and designed keeping Vastu principles in mind.
Adjacent to the kitchen with an open layout for family gatherings; features energy-efficient LED fixtures and wheelchair accessible furniture.
A compact, eco-friendly kitchen designed for energy efficiency with low-emission appliances and natural ventilation. Wheelchair-accessible counters are incorporated.
A spacious bedroom in the master suite designed with ample natural light and energy-efficient materials, following Vastu principles; includes an ensuite bathroom.
Dedicated room for servants on the ground floor to enhance convenience, incorporating eco-friendly design and adequate ventilation.
An open courtyard serving as a central gathering space that enhances natural light distribution, promotes sustainable cooling, and adheres to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A wide, barrier-free entrance ensuring wheelchair accessibility. Reinforced glass panels for energy efficiency.
An accessible balcony that provides natural lighting and fresh air to the living area.
A secondary entrance for service personnel ensuring privacy and security.

rooms.description: An eco-friendly, accessible terrace with natural ventilation, greenery, and a space for relaxation, designed to be wheelchair friendly.
An eco-friendly, accessible terrace with natural ventilation, greenery, and a space for relaxation.
